19.5	# Inner riser diameter in inches
373.2	# Length of riser in meters

4597	# Pipe length in meters (total length is pipe length+bha length+heavy weight drill pipe length)

6.5	# Outer heavy weight drill pipe diameter in inches
2.25	# Inner bha diameter in inches
6.75	# Outer bha diameter in inches
7800	# Density of pipe material in kg/m^3

0.3	# Poisson's ratio of pipe material
0.29	# Static friction factor for drag force on pipe from well wall
0.28	# Dynamic friction factor for drag force on pipe from well wall

6	# Number of segments in riser section (riser segments must be longer than heavy weight drill pipe segments)
